modules.description: Provides functions to create, modify, and export triangular meshes, including operations for node and element manipulation. Works with mesh data structures that represent geometric surfaces through triangles and associated node data. Enables exporting meshes to LaTeX, SciLab, and other formats for visualization and numerical computation.

Draws triangular meshes and Voronoi diagrams, along with level curves and super/sub-level regions based on scalar fields. Operates on mesh data structures containing points, triangles, and Voronoi information, with support for custom coloring and boundary handling. Renders visualizations directly in OCaml Graphics windows, allowing interactive exploration of geometric and scalar data.
